title: Can anyone guess what this font name?
content:
Hello,  
Can anyone please tell what is the font family used in this picture?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114856im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bj_4318.png)
  
Thanks in advance.
author: mtani

comments.content:
1. Why not go back to where you have found that picture?!  
2. Renaming Arabic fonts has made it impossible to track their history?!  
 [http://maryamsoft.com/files/Download/\_QB%20-%20Masters%20Booklet.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114856/http:/maryamsoft.com/files/Download/_QB%20-%20Masters%20Booklet.pdf "http://maryamsoft.com/files/Download/\_QB%20-%20Masters%20Booklet.pdf")

This font is TheMix Arabic by Lucas de Groot and Mouneer al-Shaarani published originally By Khatt Foundation in Typographic Matchmaking in 2007.  
 [http://www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/themixarabic/about/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114856/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/themixarabic/about/ "http://www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/themixarabic/about/")

Could people please confine font IDs to the ID section?  
 [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114856/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")

hhp
